item.title: Error Help
item.dc:creator: @a_tad_mad a tad mad
item.description:
@a_tad_mad wrote:

HERE IS THE ERROR:

HERE IS THE CODE:

[CODE] public String getKillMessage(String player) {
String[][] selection = {{"Congratulations, you have defeated ", "}},

    int; index = (int) Math.floor(Math.random() * 9);
    return selection[index][0] + player + selection[index][1];
}[/CODE]

I am a fairly good coder but I’m horrible at fixing errors. I have been trying to fix this one but I don’t exactly understand it. Any help is appreciated! Thanks!
